title: Spotify Wrapped 2025: AI DJ, Mood Mixtapes & New Features Leaked
shortdescription: Your 2025 Wrapped will include AI-generated commentary, mood-based playlists, and surprise artist videos.
author: Marcus Johnson

content.content: It’s about to get personal. Leaked screenshots and internal documents reveal Spotify Wrapped 2025 will feature a fully voiced AI DJ (powered by Spotify’s new DJ X technology) that narrates your entire year in music — complete with commentary, jokes, and emotional reactions to your listening habits.

• Mood Mixtapes: 12 auto-generated playlists based on your emotional journey throughout the year
• Artist Video Messages: Top artists record personalized thank-you videos if you’re in their top 0.01%
• Sound Town 2.0: Now with live migration stats and city vs. city battles
• ‘Your Musical Zodiac’ – an astrology-style breakdown of your personality based on listening data
Early beta testers say the AI DJ’s voice is scarily accurate — one user was told, “You really went through it in March, huh?” after a heavy Sad Girl Autumn phase.
